name: Merge Plants: Zombie Defense
description:
Are you a big fan of Zombie Defense and Merge Plants Idle game? If yes, please get ready to grow the badass plants as a swam of Zombies is about to destroy this lovely garden. Warning! Zombies are addicted to brains. Your mission is to defend and fight against these hilarious monsters.

1. Merge your crops.
Facing the greedy zombies, you can build a squad with various plants by merging them to unlock new crops. Don’t forget to power up attacks, speed up planting time before the enemies break down your door.

2.Defend your home.
Be careful how you plan a strategy to combat the massive array of zombies. They will never give up until getting into your house! You need to grow seeds as fast as you can!

3. Fun to play, simple to control.
Don’t need to pay anything except time. Yes, this is an idle merge game, everyone can get rich results even while sleeping.

How to play:
• Unlock soil plots to grow crops.
• Merge plants at the same level to create a new powerful plant
• Tactically move plants to attack zombies
• Use Super Boost to increase the power and attack speed of plants
• Shoot the zombies all down before they reach the finish line.
